abstract: The European Union pledged 105 million euros (about $148 million) Wednesday toward the safeguarding of Pompeii, one of the world's largest and most fragile open-air archaeological sites.
snippet: The European Union pledged 105 million euros (about $148 million) Wednesday toward the safeguarding of Pompeii, one of the world's largest and most fragile open-air archaeological sites.
lead_paragraph: ROME -- The European Union pledged 105 million euros (about $148 million) Wednesday toward the safeguarding of Pompeii, one of the world's largest and most fragile open-air archaeological sites.

headline.main: E.U. Pledges Large Sum for Protection of Pompeii
